sqlMap.sql:
SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.TEMPLATE_ID , A.ITEM_ID , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_CODE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', A.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE , SF_STM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', A.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , A.ITEM_LENGTH , A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ESSENTIAL_NM , A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ACCEPT_NM , A.ITEM_ORD , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1301 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId#
AND A.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.ITEM_CODE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID , A.ITEM_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.ITEM_DIVISION , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_CODE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', A.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE , SF_STM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', A.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , A.ITEM_LENGTH , A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ESSENTIAL_NM , A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ACCEPT_NM , A.ITEM_ORD , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
AND A.REQ_ID in (#reqId#,'ROOTSYSTEM_FLW')
AND A.REQ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_FLW'
AND A.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.ITEM_CODE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1

SELECT T1.*, ROWNUM RN FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID , A.ITEM_ID , B.ITEM_VALUE , B.ITEM_VALUE_NM , A.REQ_ID , A.ITEM_DIVISION , A.ITEM_NM , A.ITEM_CODE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00001', A.ITEM_CODE, '1') AS ITEM_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE , SF_STM4000_MST_CD_NM(#licGrpId#, A.ITEM_COMMON_CODE) AS ITEM_COMMON_CODE_NM , A.ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM , A.ITEM_TYPE , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'FLW00003', A.ITEM_TYPE, '1') AS ITEM_TYPE_NM , A.ITEM_LENGTH , A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ESSENTIAL_NM , A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.ITEM_ACCEPT_CD, '1') AS ITEM_ACCEPT_NM , A.ITEM_ORD , A.USE_CD , SF_STM4001_COM_CD_INFO(#licGrpId#, 'CMM00001', A.USE_CD, '1') AS USE_NM , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM PRJ1102 A LEFT JOIN PRJ1103 B ON (A.PRJ_ID = B.PRJ_ID AND A.PROCESS_ID = B.PROCESS_ID AND A.FLOW_ID = B.FLOW_ID AND A.ITEM_ID = B.ITEM_ID AND B.REQ_ID=#reqId#) WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId#
AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
AND A.REQ_ID in (#reqId#,'ROOTSYSTEM_FLW')
AND A.REQ_ID = 'ROOTSYSTEM_FLW'
AND A.ITEM_NM LIKE '%'|| #searchTargetData# ||'%'
AND A.ITEM_CODE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_TYPE = #searchTargetData#
AND A.ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #searchTargetData#
ORDER BY $paramSortFieldId$
DESC
ORDER BY A.ITEM_ORD
) T1 WHERE 1 = 1
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT LPAD('ㄴ', A.LVL*4, ' ') || A.TEMPLATE_NM AS TEMPLATE_LVL , A.TEMPLATE_NM , A.TEMPLATE_DESC , A.PRJ_ID , A.LVL , A.TEMPLATE_ID , A.UPPER_TEMPLATE_ID , (SELECT TEMPLATE_NM FROM PRJ1300 WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = A.UPPER_TEMPLATE_ID) UPPER_TEMPLATE_NM FROM PRJ1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# ) T

SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT LPAD('ㄴ', A.LVL*4, ' ') || A.TEMPLATE_NM AS TEMPLATE_LVL , A.TEMPLATE_NM , A.TEMPLATE_DESC , A.PRJ_ID , A.LVL , A.TEMPLATE_ID , A.UPPER_TEMPLATE_ID , (SELECT TEMPLATE_NM FROM PRJ1300 WHERE TEMPLATE_ID = A.UPPER_TEMPLATE_ID) UPPER_TEMPLATE_NM FROM PRJ1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# ) T
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_TEMPLATE_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_TEMPLATE_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'TMP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_TEMPLATE_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(TEMPLATE_ID) AS NEW_TEMPLATE_ID FROM PRJ1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_ID LIKE 'TMP' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# )
INSERT INTO PRJ1300 ( TEMPLATE_ID , PRJ_ID , TEMPLATE_NM , UPPER_TEMPLATE_ID , LVL , TEMPLATE_DESC , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #newTemplateId# , #prjId# , #templateNm# , #upperTemplateId# , #lvl# + 1 , #templateDesc# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ1300 A SET MODIFY_DTM = SYSDATE , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyUsrId# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyUsrIp# , TEMPLATE_NM = #templateNm# , TEMPLATE_DESC = #templateDesc# WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ1300 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert:
SELECT NVL( SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 1, 11) || LPAD( (TO_NUMBER(SUBSTR(NEW_ITEM_ID, 12, 5)) + 1) , 5, '0') , 'ITM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '00001' ) AS NEW_TEMPLATE_ID FROM ( SELECT MAX(ITEM_ID) AS NEW_ITEM_ID FROM PRJ1301 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.ITEM_ID LIKE 'ITM' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'YYYYMMDD') || '%' AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# )
INSERT INTO PRJ1301 ( TEMPLATE_ID , PRJ_ID , ITEM_ID , ITEM_NM , ITEM_CODE , ITEM_COMMON_CODE , ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM , ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM , ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM , ITEM_TYPE , ITEM_LENGTH , ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD , ITEM_ACCEPT_CD , ITEM_ORD , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #templateId# , #prjId# , #newItemId# , #itemNm# , #itemCode# , #itemCommonCode# , #itemPcRowNum# , #itemTabletRowNum# , #itemMobileRowNum# , #itemType# , NVL(#itemLength#,255) , #itemEssentialCd# , #itemAcceptCd# , NVL(#itemOrd#,0) , '01' , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ1301 A SET ITEM_NM = #itemNm# , ITEM_CODE = #itemCode# , ITEM_COMMON_CODE = #itemCommonCode# , ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM = #itemPcRowNum# , ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM = #itemTabletRowNum# , ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM = #itemMobileRowNum# , ITEM_TYPE = #itemType# , ITEM_LENGTH = #itemLength# , ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #itemEssentialCd# , ITEM_ACCEPT_CD = #itemAcceptCd# , ITEM_ORD = #itemOrd# , MODIFY_DTM = sysdate , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyusrid# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyusrip# WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.delete:
DELETE FROM PRJ1301 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.TEMPLATE_ID = #templateId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId#
AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.select: SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT A.LIC_GRP_ID , A.MST_CD , A.UPPER_MST_CD , A.MST_CD_NM , A.MST_CD_ENG_NM , A.MST_CD_DESC , A.ABORT_DT , A.LVL , A.ORD , A.USE_YN , A.STM_USE_YN , A.REG_DTM , A.REG_USR_ID , A.REG_USR_IP , A.MODIFY_DTM , A.MODIFY_USR_ID , A.MODIFY_USR_IP FROM STM4000 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.LIC_GRP_ID = #licGrpId# ) T

SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.RN BETWEEN (#firstIndex#+1) AND #lastIndex#

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ( SELECT A.PRJ_ID , A.PROCESS_ID , A.FLOW_ID , A.ITEM_ID , A.REQ_ID , A.ITEM_VALUE , A.ITEM_VALUE_NM FROM PRJ1103 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId# ) A

SELECT * FROM (
) Z WHERE 1=1 AND Z.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND Z.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND Z.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND Z.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO PRJ1102 ( PROCESS_ID , PRJ_ID , ITEM_ID , FLOW_ID , REQ_ID , ITEM_DIVISION , ITEM_NM , ITEM_CODE , ITEM_COMMON_CODE , ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM , ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM , ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM , ITEM_TYPE , ITEM_LENGTH , ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD , ITEM_ACCEPT_CD , ITEM_ORD , USE_CD , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #processId# , #prjId# , #itemId# , #flowId# , #reqId# , #itemDivision# , #itemNm# , #itemCode# , #itemCommonCode# , #itemPcRowNum# , #itemTabletRowNum# , #itemMobileRowNum# , #itemType# , NVL(#itemLength#,255) , #itemEssentialCd# , #itemAcceptCd# , NVL(#itemOrd#,0) , '01' , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )

INSERT INTO PRJ1103 ( PROCESS_ID , PRJ_ID , ITEM_ID , REQ_ID , FLOW_ID , ITEM_VALUE , ITEM_VALUE_NM , REG_DTM , REG_USR_ID , REG_USR_IP , MODIFY_DTM , MODIFY_USR_ID , MODIFY_USR_IP )VALUES( #processId# , #prjId# , #itemId# , #reqId# , #flowId# , #itemValue# , #itemValueNm# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# , SYSDATE , #regUsrId# , #regUsrIp# )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE PRJ1102 A SET ITEM_NM = #itemNm# , ITEM_CODE = #itemCode# , ITEM_COMMON_CODE = #itemCommonCode# , ITEM_PC_ROW_NUM = #itemPcRowNum# , ITEM_TABLET_ROW_NUM = #itemTabletRowNum# , ITEM_MOBILE_ROW_NUM = #itemMobileRowNum# , ITEM_TYPE = #itemType# , ITEM_LENGTH = #itemLength# , ITEM_ESSENTIAL_CD = #itemEssentialCd# , ITEM_ACCEPT_CD = #itemAcceptCd# , ITEM_ORD = #itemOrd# , MODIFY_DTM = sysdate , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyusrid# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyusrip# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#

UPDATE PRJ1103 A SET ITEM_VALUE = #itemValue# , ITEM_VALUE_NM = #itemValueNm# , MODIFY_DTM = sysdate , MODIFY_USR_ID = #modifyusrid# , MODIFY_USR_IP = #modifyusrip# WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId#
sqlMap.delete: DELETE FROM PRJ1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId#
DELETE FROM PRJ1102 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
DELETE FROM PRJ1103 A WHERE 1=1 AND A.PROCESS_ID = #processId# AND A.PRJ_ID = #prjId# AND A.FLOW_ID = #flowId# AND A.ITEM_ID = #itemId# AND A.REQ_ID = #reqId#
